name: Tiny Ludwig's Big Adventure
description:
Tiny Ludwig's Big Adventure

Ludwig decides to do another Amazon stream, but this time he doesn't remember buying a shrink ray.

A magic-school-bus-esque adventure into the inner working of Coots.

This is my first time participating in a game jam, so be a little bit easy on me.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • E to interact
  • Space to advance dialogue

Teammates:

  • fallow#4096 (me)
  • mccrii#3517
  • jhanvi#5062
  • Muls#2695
